title.rendered: Logistic CRM – Manage your business VERY EASILY by SoftwaveHub

content.rendered:
Logistic CRM - Manage your business VERY EASILY

Get Support

Pre Sales Question

Hire Us

Softwavehub LOGISTIC CRM

Softwavehub Logistics CRM is a comprehensive and easy-to-use solution for businesses of all sizes to manage their logistics operations. It covers all the essential features of a logistics management system, including:

  • Branch management
  • Parcels delivery
  • Merchant management
  • SMS system
  • User support ticket system
  • Payment accounts management system
  • Notification sending system
  • Parcel delivery history
  • Merchant invoice generator system
  • Print label system
  • Merchant online payment system
  • Merchant payout system

Softwavehub Logistics CRM can help businesses to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and provide better customer service. Here are some specific examples:

  • Improve efficiency: Softwavehub Logistics CRM can help businesses to automate many of their manual tasks, such as order processing, shipment tracking, and invoice generation. This can save businesses a significant amount of time and effort.
  • Reduce costs: Softwavehub Logistics CRM can help businesses to reduce their costs by streamlining their operations and identifying areas for improvement. For example, the system can help businesses to reduce their fuel costs by optimizing their delivery routes.
  • Provide better customer service: Softwavehub Logistics CRM can help businesses to provide better customer service by giving them a complete view of their customers and their orders. This allows businesses to respond to customer inquiries quickly and accurately.

Here are some specific examples of how the system can help businesses:

  • Branch management: The system can help businesses to manage their multiple branches efficiently. This includes tracking inventory levels, managing orders, and routing deliveries.
  • Parcels delivery: The system can help businesses to streamline their parcels delivery process. This includes managing pickups and deliveries, tracking shipments, and generating reports.
  • Merchant management: The system can help businesses to manage their merchants and their orders. This includes managing merchant accounts, processing orders, and generating invoices.
  • SMS system: The system can help businesses to communicate with their customers and merchants through SMS. This can be used to send order confirmations, delivery notifications, and other important messages.
  • User support ticket system: The system can help businesses to manage their customer support tickets. This includes tracking tickets, assigning them to agents, and resolving them quickly.
  • Payment accounts management system: The system can help businesses to manage their payment accounts. This includes tracking transactions, reconciling payments, and generating reports.
  • Notification sending system: The system can help businesses to send notifications to their customers and merchants. This can be used to send order updates, delivery notifications, and other important messages.
  • Parcel delivery history: The system can help businesses to track their parcel delivery history. This can be used to identify trends, identify areas for improvement, and resolve customer issues.
  • Merchant invoice generator system: The system can help businesses to generate invoices for their merchants. This can save businesses time and effort, and ensure that invoices are accurate and complete.
  • Print label system: The system can help businesses to print shipping labels for their parcels. This can save businesses time and effort, and ensure that labels are accurate and complete.
  • Merchant online payment system: The system can help businesses to accept online payments from their merchants. This can make it easier for merchants to pay their invoices, and can help businesses to reduce their cash flow cycle.
  • Merchant payout system: The system can help businesses to make payouts to their merchants. This can be done through a variety of methods, such as bank transfer, PayPal, or check.
